content:
Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 1 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (3, 3), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "ゲーム開始。敵空母は右下(26,26)近傍にいる。我が空母は左上(3,3)にいるため、敵空母との距離は約32ヘクス。航空部隊の航続距離は22ヘクスなので、現在位置からは敵空母に届かない。まず敵空母を発見するため、右下方向への索敵が必要。空母を南東方向に移動させつつ、航空部隊を右下方向に発艦させて索敵を開始する。敵空母の推定位置(26,26)付近を目標に、まずASQ1を発艦させる。空母は(10,10)方向に移動して敵に近づく。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 10, "y": 10}, "launch_target": {"x": 25, "y": 25}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. x=25 y=25 is out of squadron range. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=17 y=20.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking": "航空部隊の航続距離22ヘクスの制限を忘れていた。現在位置(3,3)から距離22以内に目標を設定する必要がある。(25,25)は距離が約31ヘクスで範囲外。距離22以内で最も南東方向の座標を計算すると、(17,20)あたりが適切。まずASQ1を(17,20)に発艦させて索敵を開始し、空母は南東方向に移動して次の索敵範囲を広げる準備をする。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 10, "y": 10}, "launch_target": {"x": 17, "y": 20}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 2 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ1) set a new target toward position (17, 20) while at (2, 5).

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (2, 4), en route to target (10, 10), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (2, 5), outbound toward (17, 20), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "ASQ1が(17,20)に向けて出撃中。空母は(10,10)に向けて移動中。ASQ1は目標地点に到達するまで数ターンかかる。その間にASQ2も発艦させて別方向の索敵を行うべき。敵空母は(26,26)近傍にいるので、ASQ1とは異なる角度から索敵することで発見確率を上げる。ASQ2は現在位置(2,4)から距離22以内で、より東寄りの(20,15)あたりを目標にして発艦させる。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 20, "y": 15}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. x=20 y=15 is out of squadron range. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=19 y=14.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking": "航続距離の計算を間違えた。現在空母位置(2,4)から距離22以内の座標を正確に計算する必要がある。(20,15)は距離が約22.4で範囲外。(19,14)は距離約21.4で範囲内。ASQ2を(19,14)に発艦させて、ASQ1とは少し異なる方向から索敵を行う。これで2機の航空部隊が異なる角度から敵空母の推定位置周辺を索敵できる。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 19, "y": 14}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 3 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ2) set a new target toward position (19, 14) while at (3, 6).

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (2, 6), en route to target (10, 10), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (4, 9), outbound toward (17, 20), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (3, 6), outbound toward (19, 14), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "現在2機の航空部隊が異なる方向に索敵中。ASQ1は(17,20)に向かい、ASQ2は(19,14)に向かっている。空母は(10,10)に向けて移動中。両航空部隊が目標地点に到達するまで待機し、索敵結果を確認する。敵空母発見の報告があれば攻撃に移行し、発見できなければ次の索敵計画を立てる必要がある。現在は航空部隊の行動を見守る段階。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 4 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (3, 7), en route to target (10, 10), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (6, 13), outbound toward (17, 20), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (7, 6), outbound toward (19, 14), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "両航空部隊が順調に目標地点に向かって進んでいる。ASQ1は(17,20)まであと約14ヘクス、ASQ2は(19,14)まであと約14ヘクス。どちらもまだ目標地点に到達していない。空母は(10,10)に向けて移動中で順調。現在は索敵結果を待つ段階。両機が目標地点に到達して索敵を完了するまで現在の行動を継続する。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 5 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (4, 9), en route to target (10, 10), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (9, 15), outbound toward (17, 20), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (10, 8), outbound toward (19, 14), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "両航空部隊が目標地点に接近中。ASQ1は(17,20)まであと約10ヘクス、ASQ2は(19,14)まであと約11ヘクス。空母は(10,10)まであと約7ヘクス。まだ敵空母の発見報告はない。両航空部隊が目標地点に到達するまで待機し、索敵結果を確認する。敵空母が発見されなかった場合、空母をさらに南東に進めて次の索敵範囲を拡大する準備をする。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 6 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (6, 10), en route to target (10, 10), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (12, 17), outbound toward (17, 20), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (13, 10), outbound toward (19, 14), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "両航空部隊が目標地点に非常に接近している。ASQ1は(17,20)まであと約6ヘクス、ASQ2は(19,14)まであと約7ヘクス。次のターンには両機とも目標地点に到達する可能性が高い。空母は(10,10)まであと約4ヘクス。まだ敵空母の発見報告はない。両航空部隊が目標地点で索敵を完了するまで現在の行動を継続する。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 7 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (15, 13) while at (15, 18).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (17, 13) while at (15, 18).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (15, 13) while at (16, 12).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (17, 12) while at (16, 12).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (15, 13) (previously at (17, 14)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron BSQ2: last known position (17, 12) (previously at (18, 13)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (8, 10), en route to target (10, 10), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (15, 19), outbound toward (17, 20), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (16, 12), outbound toward (19, 14), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "重要な発見！両航空部隊が敵航空部隊BSQ1とBSQ2を発見した。敵航空部隊の位置から敵空母の位置を推定できる。BSQ1が(15,13)、BSQ2が(17,12)にいる。これらの航空部隊は敵空母から発艦したものと考えられる。敵航空部隊の移動パターンから、敵空母は南東方向、おそらく(20,15)から(25,20)の範囲にいる可能性が高い。ASQ1は(17,20)に向かっているが、ASQ2は既に敵航空部隊の近くにいるので、より南東の敵空母推定位置に向かわせるべき。空母も南東に進めて次の索敵準備をする。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 15, "y": 15}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 8 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (14, 11) while at (18, 14).
- your squadron(ASQ1) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(BC1) at (20, 20) while at (19, 20).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (17, 17) while at (19, 20).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (17, 17) while at (19, 14).
- your squadron(ASQ1) is engaging an enemy carrier(BC1) while at (19, 20).
- your squadron(ASQ2) is returning to the carrier while at (19, 14).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier BC1: last known position (20, 20) (previously at (21, 20)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron BSQ1: last known position (17, 17) (previously at (17, 14)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron BSQ2: last known position (14, 11) (previously at (18, 13)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (9, 11), en route to target (15, 15), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (19, 20), engaging an enemy target at (20, 20), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (19, 14), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "素晴らしい！ASQ1が敵空母BC1を(20,20)で発見し攻撃中！これは大きな戦術的優位。敵空母のHPは100/100で、ASQ1が攻撃を行っている。ASQ2は帰還中。敵航空部隊BSQ1が(17,17)、BSQ2が(14,11)にいる。敵空母を先に発見できたので、波状攻撃を仕掛けるチャンス。ASQ2が帰還したら即座に再発艦させて敵空母への第二波攻撃を行う。空母は敵空母に近づきすぎないよう、現在の目標(15,15)で適切。敵の反撃に備えて位置を調整する準備も必要。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 9 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(ASQ1) initiated an attack on an enemy carrier(BC1) while at (19, 20).
- your squadron(ASQ1) hit an enemy carrier(BC1) causing 20 damage while at (19, 20).
- your squadron(ASQ1) is returning to the carrier while at (19, 20).
- your squadron(ASQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (18, 19) while at (17, 14).
- your squadron(ASQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ1) at (19, 19) while at (19, 20).
- your carrier(AC1) spotted an enemy squadron(BSQ2) at (10, 11) while at (11, 12).

- Enemy carrier BC1: last known position (20, 20) (previously at (21, 20)), HP 78/100.

Your forces:
- Your carrier AC1: position (11, 12), en route to target (15, 15), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron ASQ1: position (19, 20), returning to the carrier, HP 20/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron ASQ2: position (15, 14), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "優秀！ASQ1が敵空母BC1に20ダメージを与えた（HP78/100）。ASQ1は被弾してHP20/40になったが帰還中。ASQ2も帰還中でHP40/40と無傷。敵航空部隊BSQ2が我が空母近くの(10,11)にいるのが危険。敵空母の位置(20,20)は判明しているので、ASQ2が帰還次第すぐに第二波攻撃を仕掛けるべき。空母は敵航空部隊BSQ2から離れるため、現在の目標(15,15)への移動を継続。敵空母への波状攻撃で勝利を目指す。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 10 of 30.

Recent events:

- Your squadron ASQ2: position (11, 13), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "状況が変化！我が空母AC1が敵航空部隊BSQ2を攻撃し30ダメージを与えた（敵HP19/40）が、我が空母もHP70/100に被弾。敵空母BC1が(19,18)に移動している。ASQ1とASQ2が帰還中。ASQ2は無傷なので、帰還次第すぐに敵空母(19,18)への第二波攻撃を発艦させるべき。空母は敵航空部隊から離れるため(15,15)への移動を継続。敵空母のHPは78/100なので、もう1回の攻撃で撃沈できる可能性が高い。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}
